## Typography

---

```html {#h1}
<h1>Heading 1</h1>
```

```html {#h2}
<h2>Heading 2</h2>
```

```html {#h3}
<h3>Heading 3</h3>
```

```html {#h4}
<h4>Heading 4</h4>
```

```html {#h5}
<h5>Heading 5</h5>
```

```html {#h6}
<h6>Heading 6</h6>
```

```html {#paragraph}
<p>Paragraph</p>
```

```html {#subtle-text}
<div class="go-textSubtle">Subtle text</div>
```

```html {#label-text}
<div class="go-textLabel">Label text</div>
```

```html {#pagination-text}
<div class="go-textPagination">Pagination text</div>
```

```html {#code-text}
<code>Code text</code>
```

```html {#pre-text}
<pre>Preformated text</pre>
```

```html {#link-text}
<a href="#typography" data-gtmc="_ link">Link</a>
```
